channel.title: Dupe help! =[
channel.description:
A= duper 1 (killer) B= duper 2 (gets killed)
Well, this is very easy.
A and B meets at a Pk zone. B gets cash or anything that he will lose on death. Then A attacks B, and as soon as B gets killed, A quickly disconnects or xlog. Then there will be double loots on ground.
Example: If B loses 10m. there will be 2 piles of 10m cash on ground.

item.title: Dupe help! =[
item.dc:creator: @Feel_No_Pain Feel No Pain
item.description:
@Feel_No_Pain wrote:

B= duper 2 (gets killed)

Well, this is very easy.

A and B meets at a Pk zone. B gets cash or anything that he will lose on death. Then A attacks B, and as soon as B gets killed, A quickly disconnects or xlog. Then there will be double loots on ground.

Example: If B loses 10m. there will be 2 piles of 10m cash on ground.
